events.message: Candidate John Doe has submitted an application for the software engineer position with a strong resume highlighting relevant experience.
The application for John Doe has been categorised under Engineering based on his resume that includes software development skills.
Recruiter Sarah Lee has been assigned to manage the hiring process for John Doe's software engineer application.
Initial phone screening completed with John Doe; candidate demonstrated strong problem-solving skills and relevant experience.
John Doe responded promptly to the interview scheduling email and confirmed availability for a technical interview.
Technical interview with John Doe has been scheduled for May 15 at 3 PM to assess coding and system design capabilities.
John Doe completed the technical interview successfully, demonstrating strong coding skills and architectural understanding.
HR interview has been scheduled with John Doe for May 18 to discuss cultural fit and career goals.
HR interview completed, John Doe expressed enthusiasm for the role and company values during the discussion.
An offer has been proposed to John Doe, including competitive compensation and benefits for the software engineer position.
John Doe has provided positive feedback on the offer and asked some clarifying questions on the benefits package.
John Doe has accepted the offer and is excited to join the engineering team as a new software engineer.
Onboarding process has started for John Doe, including system access setup and introductory meetings planned.
The hiring process for software engineer John Doe has been successfully closed with all steps completed.
